products.title: Harewood Plain Cream Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. Purchase the popular harewood cream vertical blind from kingston blinds direct and get a free sample or delivery on orders over 145.
